writing.name: CONTINUE
writing.text: Continue

writing.name: DAY1_BEGIN_HALLWAY
writing.text: You are in a new high school which opened this year. It's exciting and you're hoping they'll be easy on the coursework. You feel nervous but you're also happy to meet new people.

writing.name: DAY1_BUTTERFLY
writing.text: Characters will remember your decisions. Be careful with what you choose.

writing.name: DAY1_CLASSROOM_01
writing.text: Another school year... You wonder if the food is better here. It should be...

writing.name: DAY1_CLASSROOM_01_CHOICE_CLASSMATE_01
writing.text: You notice two classmates one on your left and right. A boy and a girl.

writing.name: DAY1_TALK_TO_BOY
writing.text: Talk to the boy on your left

writing.name: DAY1_TALK_TO_GIRL
writing.text: Talk to the girl on you right

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_01_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: You: Hi! What's your name?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_01_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Boy: I'm Ash... you?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_01_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: You: I'm Alex

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_01_DIALOGUE_04
writing.text: Ash: Nice! Do you live nearby?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_01_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_01
writing.text: Yes. How about you?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_01_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_02
writing.text: No. How about you?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_01_DIALOGUE_05
writing.text: Ash: You could say that...

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_01_DIALOGUE_06
writing.text: Oh, cool....

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_02_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: You: Hi! What's your name?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_02_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Girl: I'm Max... you?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_02_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: You: I'm Alex

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_02_DIALOGUE_04
writing.text: Max: Nice to meet you! Nice new school huh? Do you live nearby?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_02_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_01
writing.text: Yes. How about you?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_02_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_02
writing.text: No. How about you?

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_02_DIALOGUE_05
writing.text: Max: Yeah, I've lived here all my life.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_PT02_TIME_PASS01
writing.text: Time passes by and the school bell rings. Everyone goes to have lunch in the cafeteria. You tag along with the classmate you just met.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_PT02_TIME_PASS_ASH01
writing.text: Ash: Oh this is Max. She's new as well.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_PT02_TIME_PASS_ASH02
writing.text: You: Hey! Nice to meet you.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_PT02_TIME_PASS_ASH03
writing.text: Max: Nice to meet you!.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_PT02_TIME_PASS_MAX01
writing.text: Max: Oh this is Ash. He's new as well.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_PT02_TIME_PASS_MAX02
writing.text: You: Oh hey, Nice you meet you!.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_PT02_TIME_PASS_MAX03
writing.text: Ash: Hey...Nice to meet you.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_PT02_TIME_PASS
writing.text: After going for the food, both of the classmates are looking for seats. They seem to be going to the same table.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_CHOICE_01
writing.text: Go have lunch with them.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_CHOICE_02
writing.text: Grab a quick bite and mind your own business.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: You share a nice meal with your new classmates and learn a bit more about them.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Max has a big sister and Ash has two little brothers and luckily both like Pac Man.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: You feel like this will be a good year.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_BORED
writing.text: You're bored in class and see Ash and Max whispering. The teacher is shushing them.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASROOM_PT03_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_01
writing.text: Eavesdrop on the conversation.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_PT03_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_02
writing.text: Ignore them.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASROOM_EAVESDROP_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Ash is asking Max for a pencil.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASROOM_EAVESDROP_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: 'Sure!' Max says and hands Ash the pencil. You see it's a new one.

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASROOM_EAVESDROP_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: Who would lend a new pencil? Oh well... That's cool.

writing.name: DAY_1_ENDING
writing.text: After a while of daydreaming about Pacman you hear the bell ring and head home.
